<JD_START>
Job Title: Financial Analyst - Underwriting

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
3E Management, LLC (“3E”) is on the lookout for a detail-oriented and dynamic Financial Analyst. This role is integral to our mission of delivering top-tier real estate financial modeling services to our distinguished private equity clients.
ResponsibilitiesCollaborate in crafting sophisticated Excel and ARGUS acquisition/development models, spanning all types of real estate, for our private equity clienteleParticipate in the critique and enhancement of Excel financial models to ensure optimal performance and client satisfactionAid in the development of detailed waterfall calculations that drive financial decision-making for our clientsProvide support in managing part-time professionals, fostering a high-performance cultureUndertake additional responsibilities as per business requirements, embodying a proactive approach
QualificationsA Bachelor’s degree, setting the foundation for your financial acumen1-3 years of experience, with compensation tailored to reflect your expertiseMeticulous, with robust organizational skills and an unwavering eye for detailAn anticipatory problem-solver, able to predict management's needs and propose innovative solutionsA self-starter, demonstrating the initiative and drive that aligns with our dynamic environmentProficiency in the Microsoft Office Suite (Outlook, PowerPoint, Word, Excel)Exceptional communication abilities, both written and verbal, to articulate complex financial concepts effectivelyRobust problem-solving skills that aid in navigating complex financial challengesAdept at multi-tasking and managing diverse priorities in a fast-paced settingA professional bearing, upholding the highest level of confidentiality and integrity
Firm Profile3E Management, LLC, guided by Eric Bergin's expert leadership and 23 years of experience in real estate and finance, stands at the forefront of financial consulting. Founded in 2016, 3E has cemented its reputation in providing strategic and financial analyses to over 200 private equity companies, developers, and family offices worldwide. Each year, 3E has underwritten transactions exceeding $26 billion, showcasing our commitment to excellence and client success. Before establishing 3E, Mr. Bergin was a Director at Rockpoint Group, spearheading the finance group and overseeing acquisitions, asset management, and investor reporting activities. Starting his illustrious career as an Associate at Pricewaterhouse Coopers, he contributed significantly to the financial advisory services group. Mr. Bergin is a proud alumnus of Southern Methodist University, graduating in 2001.
3E is a staunch believer in equal employment opportunities and champions diversity in all its facets. We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, marital status, age, disability, national origin, citizenship, or any other protected characteristic. We're committed to fostering an inclusive workspace that celebrates the unique contributions of all our employees.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
